text:
(c) the total number of employees who have left the undertaking during the reporting period
and the rate of employee turnover in the reporting period.
(d) a description of the methodologies and assumptions used to compile the data, including
whether the numbers are reported:
i. in head count or full-time equivalent (FTE) (including an explanation of how FTE is
defined); and
ii. at the end of the reporting period, as an average across the reporting period, or
using another methodology.
